oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Views of Nashville, Tenn., 1907
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard depicting several Nashville landmarks, including the State Penitentiary, the Confederate Monument in Mt. Olivet Cemetery, the Parthenon in Centennial Park, two images of the United States Post Office and Custom House, Union Station, Andrew Jackson equestrian statue, Tennessee State Capitol, the Hermitage, the tomb of James K. Polk, and the Duncan Hotel. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : b & w ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845--Homes and haunts--Tennessee--Hermitage; Polk, James K. (James Knox), 1795-1849--Tomb; Jackson, Andrew, 1767-1845--Monuments
